Package fb.rt.math

This package provides abstract superclasses and concrete implementations for IEC 61499 function blocks for mathematical operations on IEC 61131-3 data types.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FBStatus This interface provides the STATUS codes defined in Table D.1 of IEC 61499, plus an additional FBStatus.ARRAY_SIZE_ERROR code for MATRIX operations.
 

Class Summary
FB_ROT_ANY This is the abstract superclass for the bitwise rotation function blocks FB_ROL_xxx, FB_ROR_xxx, where xxx is one of the IEC 61131-3 bit string data types BYTE, WORD, DWORD, or LWORD.
FBFunction The abstract superclass of all functions with a REQ/CNF event pair and a single output variable, OUT.
FBFunction1 The abstract superclass of all functions with a REQ/CNF event pair and an IN/OUT data pair.
FBFunction2 The abstract superclass of all functions with a REQ/CNF event pair, a single output variable OUT and two inputs IN1 and IN2.
FBFunctionIN1 The abstract superclass of all functions with a REQ/CNF event pair and an IN1/OUT data pair.
FBFunctionQS2 The abstract superclass of all functions with a REQ/CNF event pair, a single output variable OUT, two inputs IN1 and IN2, and QI/QO/STATUS I/O.
 

Package fb.rt.math Description

This package provides abstract superclasses and concrete implementations for IEC 61499 function blocks for mathematical operations on IEC 61131-3 data types.
